lines.text:
[walks over to Tommy Callahan]
Hey, hey, hey, hey. Nobody told you you could hang around decent people, Callahan. Hey Turk, do you know who you just let in? He's the guy who killed ol' Jimmy John Jones. Didn't ya, killer?... I said, Didn't ya, killer?
This is one of my customers, Harry. Now, you leave him be.
Aww... leave him be? You're putting me on! Hey, is there anybody here wanna let this man dirty up a nice clean place like Turk's?

[laughing]
The killer wants to know if I'm drunk. I am sober, mister Callahan, so why don't you...
[Tommy punches him, and a knockdown, drag-out fight ensues]
